No earlier than the final reference implementation and support for Organizations and if the framework is not performant enough: Tentatively scheduled well into the future: Move Framework to AssemblyScript (allowing for transpilation to TypeScript for in browser debugging) and run in WASM. Scheduled out quite a bit farther: make framework transpile to C (and some libs I assume, school experience only). This will greatly reduce the amount of resources required to run on personal devices or in resource constrained environments. The Apps will be written in AssemblyScript too, and SqLite will be linked in directly.
